subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brian Campbell scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and the Florida Panthers got two more scores in the third period to win their third straight, beating the Oilers, 4-2, in Edmonton.
snippet: Brian Campbell scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and the Florida Panthers got two more scores in the third period to win their third straight, beating the Oilers, 4-2, in Edmonton.
